instructions: Participants produced subjective sampling distributions for three populations (sexes p=.50, heartbeat type p=.80, and height) across three sample sizes (N = 10, 100, 1000).

items.question: On what percentage of days will the number/proportion of the characteristic in the sample (N=10, 100, or 1000) fall into the following categories? (Answers should add up to 100%)
